scripts.docs:
echo "*** Building API docs
" && react-docgen src/components/*.jsx -x js -o examples/src/api/docs.json --pretty
scripts.watch:
echo "*** Watching...
" && babel src/components --optional runtime --stage 0 --out-dir dist/components  --watch
scripts.build:
echo "*** Building lib
" && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/components && cp src/components/*.css dist/components && babel src/components --optional runtime --stage 0 --out-dir dist/components && babel src/index.js --optional runtime --stage 0 --out-file dist/index.js
scripts.build-website:
echo "*** Building website
" && rm -rf docs && react-scripts build && mv build docs
